item.title: Use Ogg Vorbis for Lag-free Ringtones on Android
item.description: Update 2010-06-21: If you want to use custom ringtones in the first place, install Rings Extended from the Android Market, then go to Home Settings Sound & display Phone ringtone.Â When it asks which application you want to use, select Rings Extended, and check the checkbox so that it doesn't ask you again. This will work anywhere any application asks for you to pick a ringtone, assuming it asks via a standard means!
